channel.title: Update Reachy on
channel.description: Recent content in Update Reachy on

item.title: Update Reachy 2 software
item.description: Use the dashboard # The update of the robot can be entirely done with the dashboard. From the Updates tab, check if updates are available: Only advanced update management is working so far Advanced update management # From the dashboard Update page, click on Advanced udpate management: You can directly access the advanced update dashboard from http://<IP.address>:5000/ Fetch updates # Click Fetch Updates to check if there is any available update on one of the robot’s services.
